import { basketProducts } from "../data/basketProducts"; import { products } from "../data/products"; interface CheckBasketProductProps { id: number userId: number count: number[] } // card basket product export function BasketProduct({ id, userId, count }: CheckBasketProductProps){ return(

{ products[id].title }

{ products[id].category }

{ products[id].price } ₽

кол-во - { basketProducts[userId].productInfo[Number(0)].count} |

); }
